books.author: by Robert Galbraith
books.description: The seventh book in the Cormoran Strike series. Strike's business partner, Robin Ellacott, goes inside a cult to rescue someone who has joined it.
books.name: THE RUNNING GRAVE

books.author: by Ken Follett
books.description: The fifth book in the Kingsbridge series. Change and turmoil affect various aspects of society in the latter part of the 18th century.
books.name: THE ARMOR OF LIGHT

books.author: by Rebecca Yarros
books.description: Violet Sorrengail is urged by the commanding general, who also is her mother, to become a candidate for the elite dragon riders.
books.name: FOURTH WING

books.author: by James Patterson and Mike Lupica
books.description: A criminal defense attorney who received a terminal diagnosis might be in danger of being murdered.
books.name: 12 MONTHS TO LIVE

books.author: by Sarah J. Maas
books.description: The second book in the Crescent City series. Bryce Quinlan and Hunt Athalar must choose to fight or stay silent.
books.name: HOUSE OF SKY AND BREATH

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: The private detective Holly Gibney investigates whether a married pair of octogenarian academics had anything to do with Bonnie Dahl’s disappearance.
books.name: HOLLY

books.author: by Sarah J. Maas
books.description: Passion arises between Bryce Quinlan and Hunt Athalar as they seek to avenge the deaths of Bryce’s friends.
books.name: HOUSE OF EARTH AND BLOOD

books.author: by Ann Patchett
books.description: Three daughters, who return to their family orchard in the spring of 2020, learn about their mother’s relationship with a famous actor.
books.name: TOM LAKE

books.author: by Bonnie Garmus
books.description: A scientist and single mother living in California in the 1960s becomes a star on a TV cooking show.
books.name: LESSONS IN CHEMISTRY

books.author: by Lucy Score
books.description: The third book in the Knockemout series. A mogul and a small-town librarian share a dark secret from their past.
books.name: THINGS WE LEFT BEHIND

books.author: by Freida McFadden
books.description: Troubles surface when a woman looking to make a fresh start takes a job in the home of the Winchesters.
books.name: THE HOUSEMAID

books.author: by V.E. Schwab
books.description: Tes, a girl who possesses a magical ability, has a device that might alter the fate of four worlds connected to London.
books.name: THE FRAGILE THREADS OF POWER

books.author: by Hannah Grace
books.description: Anastasia might need the help of the captain of a college hockey team to get on the Olympic figure skating team.
books.name: ICEBREAKER

books.author: by Mary Kay Andrews
books.description: A Christmas tree farmer from North Carolina sets up a stand in Greenwich Village and comes to the aid of nearby residents.
books.name: BRIGHT LIGHTS, BIG CHRISTMAS

books.author: by Abraham Verghese
books.description: Three generations of a family living on South India’s Malabar Coast suffer the loss of a family member by drowning.
books.name: THE COVENANT OF WATER
